thought: To craft red_concrete_powder, I need to place 1 red_dye, 4 sand, and 4 gravel in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move the red_dye from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
